column2: Traffic;A Korean man drove an RX300 units into a motorcycle repair shop. ------Fortunately
column3: there are no injuries.------This event happened at 2:00 am on September 11
column4: 2018 at the front of Borey Sen Sok along Street 598 in Phnom Penh Thmei.------According to sources from the scene
column5: a pre-incident happened when the Korean man swerved to avoid a white Camry. The car hit the building
column7: the cops came to a compromise between the two sides
column8: with the Korean car owner agreeing to pay $2
